lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Hell yeah! You shot the bananas out of them monkeys!

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I can now confidently say that you are ready to face Klat Yeknom.

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Stop it Snorlie you're going to make me cry too...

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Klat Yeknom's lair is somewhere in that jungle ahead.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I'm sure you will find it.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I figured out that you were the girl from my dream.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I'll see you back in your room once all of this is over okay?

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: You better cuddle me hard after all of this.
